Efforts to #LowerLakeO before wet season are paying off. This operational adjustment was huge - mitigating the need to discharge toxic water or evacuate communities around the lake in the days leading up to Dorian’s anticipated landfall. Check it out: pic.twitter.com/43xUckJGyZ

Here are some tips as we prepare for potential power outages:
✅Download the FPL app by texting “App” to 69375
✅Adjust refrigerators to the coldest settings to keep food fresh longer
✅If you see a downed power line, call 911 or 1-800-4OUTAGE
